Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that allows people to communicate over a distance, like a string telephone.
The student can show how the device uses sound to communicate by using a string and cups.
The student can include two students using the device to talk to each other from separate ends.
The student can demonstrate that the designed device is made from the materials provided, like cups and string.
The student can indicate how sound travels through the device to convey information over a distance.
